name: Grumpy Cat Minion
description:

It's your face."

"Row, row, row your boat
gently off a flipping cliff."

Don't worry, I'm vaccinated."

"Love is in the air.
Try not to breathe."

"Your tears
give me strength."

name: Minion Me Sticker+FREE B&W Minion Portrait!
description:
3inx3in logo printed on high quality vinyl with permanent adhesive- laminated with gloss laminate
UV resistant ink- can withstand outdoor use without fading 

FREE Black & White Minion Portrait! 
(1) send a picture of your face and
(2) a full body shot with what you'd like to wear
to minionmoi@gmail.com to receive your FREE drawing

If you stick our logo in an interesting place feel free to tag us on instagram, facebook, and twitter! We'd love to see! =)

name: Customize!
description:
LOVE + FUN + UNIQUE = YOU ! 




Just 
(1) email us a picture of your face (minionmoi@gmail.com)
(2) the outfit you’d like to wear in the portrait, and 
(3) a small description and we’ll handle the rest. 

You’d like to wear an Iron Man suit? No problem! Your favorite sport is Basketball? You got it. You want us to draw in a fox tail and unicorn wings? Only if you want us to =) We are here to celebrate your individuality. 



-hand painted w/ premium acrylic paint
-3x4 inches panels cut by hand and primed 
-coated with professional gloss to give it a quality finish

Oh and did we mention? FREE SHIPPING on all orders within the US and only $2 shipping for international orders! =) because we love you.

*Note*

a. The limit for the number of draft revisions is 3; extra revisions is an extra charge so please be as detailed as possible when describing how you would like the character
b. Due to the high order volume please allow up to 3 days for the first draft and up to 2 weeks for the finished product
c. For custom sizes email minionmoi@gmail.com for a quote

Thank You!
